Package bn.inference

Class MarkovBlanketSampler

  • java.lang.Object
    • bn.inference.MarkovBlanketSampler
  • public class MarkovBlanketSampler
extends java.lang.Object
    Class implementing the method for sampling from a variable's Markov blanket, as described in AIMA 14.5.2.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected BayesianNetwork network
      The BayesianNetwork being sampled by this MarkovBlanketSampler.
      protected java.util.Random random
      The random number generator used by this MarkovBlanketSampler.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      MarkovBlanketSampler​(BayesianNetwork network)
      Construct and return a new MarkovBlanketSampler for the given BayesianNetwork.
      MarkovBlanketSampler​(BayesianNetwork network, long seed)
      Construct and return a new MarkovBlanketSampler for the given BayesianNetwork using the given seed for the Random number generator.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      protected void sample​(RandomVariable Xi, Assignment xvec)
      Choose and set the value for for variable Xi in xvec by sampling from P(Xi|mb(Xi)) where ``mb(Xi)'' refers to the Markov blanket of Xi and current state of the network is xvec.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • network

        protected BayesianNetwork network
        The BayesianNetwork being sampled by this MarkovBlanketSampler.

      • random

        protected java.util.Random random
        The random number generator used by this MarkovBlanketSampler. Pass a seed to the constructor to make it repeatable.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MarkovBlanketSampler

        public MarkovBlanketSampler​(BayesianNetwork network)
        Construct and return a new MarkovBlanketSampler for the given BayesianNetwork. Note that changes to the variables in the network will not be seen by the sampler (so don't do that).

      • MarkovBlanketSampler

        public MarkovBlanketSampler​(BayesianNetwork network,
                            long seed)
        Construct and return a new MarkovBlanketSampler for the given BayesianNetwork using the given seed for the Random number generator.

    • Method Detail

      • sample

        protected void sample​(RandomVariable Xi,
                      Assignment xvec)
        Choose and set the value for for variable Xi in xvec by sampling from P(Xi|mb(Xi)) where ``mb(Xi)'' refers to the Markov blanket of Xi and current state of the network is xvec. This algorithm is based on Eq. 14.12 at the bottom of p. 538 ("Why Gibbs Sampling Works").

        Not the most efficient implementation, what with allocating a Distribution every time...
